languages.text: "Знамение шепотом алым сплелось в паутине гаданий: враг жаждал гибели тех, кто был одинок во мраке покоев своих. Но он не успел — ткачи провели твою свиту нитями тайными в нашу обитель".

"An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."
languages.original_text: "Знамение шепотом алым сплелось в паутине гаданий: враг жаждал гибели тех, кто был одинок во мраке покоев своих. Но он не успел — ткачи провели твою свиту нитями тайными в нашу обитель".

traits.locale_text: "The omen whispered scarlet In a web of prophecy: the enemy longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the weavers led your retinue into our abode by a secret thread."

"The omen whispered scarlet In a web of prophecy: the enemy longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the weavers led your retinue into our abode by a secret thread."

"The omen of a scarlet whisper has intertwined itself with the web of prophecy: the enemy longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers, but they were too late — the weavers had already led your retinue to our abode via a secret thread."

"An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."

languages.text: «Un presagio, un susurro escarlata, insertado en la telaraña de la profecía: el enemigo ansiaba masacrar a sus presas aisladas en sus aposentos. Pero llegó tarde: los tejedores ya habíamos llevado a sus elegidos a nuestra morada por un hilo oculto».
languages.original_text: "An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."

traits.locale_text: «Un presagio, un susurro escarlata, insertado en la telaraña de la profecía: el enemigo ansiaba masacrar a sus presas aisladas en sus aposentos. Pero llegó tarde: los tejedores ya habíamos llevado a sus elegidos a nuestra morada por un hilo oculto».

languages.text: 「予感…緋色の囁きが予言の網に絡み取られた。敵の望みは、部屋にひとりでいる者達を虐殺すること。しかし、こちらの方が上手…紡績工はすでに隠し糸をたどって、あなたに選ばれた数名をこちらへ導いていたのだ」
languages.original_text: "An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."

traits.locale_text: 「予感…緋色の囁きが予言の網に絡み取られた。敵の望みは、部屋にひとりでいる者達を虐殺すること。しかし、こちらの方が上手…ウィーヴァーはすでに隠し糸をたどって、あなたに選ばれた数名をこちらへ導いていたのだ」

languages.text: “一个预兆，血红色的低语声，渗入了预言之网。那些敌人打算屠戮落单的义人，但他们的阴谋未能实现——织网者早已看到了隐秘的丝线，将被您选中的那些人带到了我们的圣所。”
languages.original_text: "An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."

traits.locale_text: “一个预兆，血红色的低语声，渗入了预言之网。那些敌人打算屠戮落单的义人，但他们的阴谋未能实现——织网者早已看到了隐秘的丝线，将被您选中的那些人带到了我们的圣所。”

languages.text: "Ein Omen, ein rotes Flüstern, blutete in das Netz der Prophezeiung: Der Feind sehnte sich danach, jene abzuschlachten, die allein in ihren Gemächern waren. Doch er war zu spät: Die Spinner hatten Eure wenigen Auserwählten bereits über einen verborgenen Faden in unsere Heimstatt geführt."
languages.original_text: "An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Omen, ein rotes Flüstern, blutete in das Netz der Prophezeiung: Der Feind sehnte sich danach, jene abzuschlachten, die allein in ihren Gemächern waren. Doch er war zu spät: Die Spinner hatten Eure wenigen Auserwählten bereits über einen verborgenen Faden in unsere Heimstatt geführt."

languages.text: « Un présage, un murmure écarlate s'était infiltré dans la toile de la prophétie pour nous prévenir que nos ennemis avaient soif du sang de ceux qui trouvaient seuls dans leurs quartiers. Mais ils sont arrivés trop tard : les tisseurs avaient déjà conduit vos élus jusqu'à notre demeure par un fil caché. »
languages.original_text: "An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."

traits.locale_text: « Un présage, un murmure écarlate s'était infiltré dans la toile de la prophétie pour nous prévenir que nos ennemis avaient soif du sang de ceux qui trouvaient seuls dans leurs quartiers. Mais ils sont arrivés trop tard : les tisseurs avaient déjà conduit vos élus jusqu'à notre demeure par un fil caché. »

languages.text: "Kehanet ağına bir alamet, kızıl bir fısıltı işlenmiş: Odada yalnız başına kalanları katletme arzusuyla yanıp tutuşan düşmanlar. Ancak çok geç kaldılar. Dokurlar, özenle seçtiğiniz hizmetkârlarınızı gizli bir iplik üzerinden hâlihazırda meskenimize yönlendirdi."
languages.original_text: "An omen, a scarlet whisper, bled into the web of prophecy: the foe longed to slaughter those alone in their chambers. But they were too late — the spinners had already led your chosen few to our abode along a hidden thread."
